  2. 02

Prompt:

The plyr package has by now been replaced by other, even faster packages, but the idea of Split, apply, combine is as relevant as ever.

Read the paper The Split-Apply-Combine Strategy for Data Analysis by Hadley Wickham.

Write a blog post addressing the questions:

  1. Which (base R) functions do you know that support the split-apply-combine strategy? In your opinion, are these sufficient - state why or why not?.
  2. Using a dataset of your choice, describe how you can use the split-apply-combine strategy for a prt of the data analysis.

Go to https://github.com/Stat585-at-ISU/blog for instructions about how to prepare and submit your blog post.
